activities:
AG Interactive, Inc. (a wholly-owned, indirect subsidiary of American Greetings Corporation) operates the following websites and applications: American Greetings Website & App, www.americangreetings.com; BlueMountain Website & App, www.bluemountain.com; justWink Website & App, www.justwink.com,
LiveGreetings Website & App, www.livegreetings.com.  These Websites and Apps collect personal information from the user to process and send ecards to other individuals, create accounts and order processing.  AG Interactive, Inc. also owns and operates the Thanklist Website, which collects personal information from user for the purposes of creating accounts, posting videos and social networking.  

American Greetings may also receive customer or employee personal data as part of its operations and management.
personaldata: organization, employee, client, customer, consumer data (which may include manually processed data)
